name: InfluenzaVaccination
title: Influenza Vaccination
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent influenza vaccinations.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with influenza vaccinations that are SNOMED CT, CPT, and HCPCS codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes CVX vaccine codes.)
